About

My name is Yangqingwei Shi (史杨勍惟). I don’t have an official English name and most people just call me Yang (pronounced as young).

I am currently an SWE-SRE III at Google (San Francisco Office). I work on Personalized Service Health team, under Google Cloud Organization. My daily work is related to Distributed System, Cloud Infrastructure, Cloud Platform Developing and Site Reliability Engineering.

I graduated with M.S. dergree from Computer Science Deparatment, Carnegie Mellon University. My graduate program is MSCS (Master of Science in Computer Science). Prior to this, I received my B.S. degree (SUMMA CUM LAUDE) from Peking University in Computer Science major.

Timeline

  • 2023-03: Switched team to Personalized Service Health.
  • 2019-07: Promoted to SWE-SRE III.
  • 2019-04: Started working at Google as SWE II, joined Virtual Testing team. Moved to San Francisco, CA.
  • 2017-12: Graduated at Carnegie Mellon University with M.S. degree in Computer Science.
  • 2017-08: Completed summer internship at Amazon, worked with Customer Service Technology team.
  • 2016-08: Started master program (MSCS) at Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA.
  • 2016-06: Graduated at Peking University, with B.S degree (SUMMA CUM LAUDE).
  • 2015-09: Completed 3-month research internship at Carnegie Mellon University, supervised by Dr. Jonathan Aldrich.
  • 2012-09: Started undergraduate at Peking University, Beijing.
  • 2012-06: Graduated at No.2 High School attached to East China Normal University, Shanghai.
  • 1993-12: Born in Shanghai.
